question: The chart shows average student test scores from 2010 to 2020 (on a 0–100 scale). Based on this context, what is the most accurate assessment?

options.A: There was a dramatic improvement in student performance
options.B: There was a steady but modest improvement over time
options.D: The trend cannot be determined from this chart

explanation: The y-axis uses a very narrow range (78–82) instead of the full 0–100 scale, making the 3-point improvement appear much more dramatic than it actually is. A 1.75-point improvement on a 100-point scale represents only a modest 2% increase over 10 years.
